title: Episode #44: Mindsets for Success Part 6: The Healthy Stress, Expectancy, Willpower, and Spiritual Mindsets
description:
A mindset is an attitude, or a cluster of thoughts with attached information and emotions that generate a particular perception. They shape how you see and interact with the world. They can catapult you forward, allowing you to achieve dreams, or put you in reverse drive if you are not careful.
In this episode I continue the discussion on mindsets for success, focusing on the Healthy Stress, Expectancy, Willpower, and Spiritual Mindsets.
For more information, check out my new book THINK LEARN SUCCEED: https://thinklearnsucceedbook.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
